ygData.subject: Re: Root vs Enstill
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear Cristie Therefore Root and Enstill are the same spell? Root stops your feet moving while Enstill stops your whole body moving? Simon
ygData.messageBody:
Dear Cristie

Therefore Root and Enstill are the same spell? Root stops your feet moving
while Enstill stops your whole body moving?

Simon



Cristie wrote:

> From: Cristie <cristie@...>
>
> Root means the NPC you cast it on doesn't move... of course if it doesn't
> resist the spell..which happens. You get this at level 4.
> Enstill means a stronger version of Root, it looks like. Same
> definition. You get this one at level 20. I would venture to guess the
> NPC's can still resist it if they are able to.
> You can always try to cast when you are getting bashed...sometimes you can
> pop your spells off and other times you are interrupted and lose
> concentration and sometimes you get bashed and regain concentration and
> continue casting. Try to shoot your spells off while the NPC isn't
> smacking you.. a lot of it is in your timing, unless you have a bunch of
> monsters on you.
>
> At 12:31 AM 5/14/99 +0100, you wrote:
> >From: Simon Hinshelwood <iktome@...>
> >
> >Dear Valacian,
> >
> >What exactly is the difference between root and enstill? And can you cast
> >them while getting bashed? Somtimes I can sometimes I cant.
> >
> >Simon
> >
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> How many communities do you think join ONElist each day?
> http://www.onelist.com
> More than 1,000!
